NAME:
   flagUsage - A new cli application

USAGE:
   flagUsage [global options] command [command options] [arguments...]

COMMANDS:
   help, h  Shows a list of commands or help for one command

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --num value  A number of things. (default: 0)
   --str value  A piece of text.
   --help, -h   show help (default: false)
